page.title: 12A Child's View
page.content: I live at 60 Hillside Avenue.I live in a sort of countryside town,in this town of Bridgnorth. My house is near a new by-pass.There is a new bridge over the River Severn as well as the old stone one.There are some factories near to where I live :Star Aluminiuim,Tatung Electrical and Choron Pipes. The Lowtown is not very modern,many of the shops are old,one is very old,it is half timbered.Most of the really interesting things are in the High Town area.Lowtown, towards the bridge is all very old.Once a great inland port with ships called'trows passing from London via the sea,up the Severn to Shrewsbury. There are a few shops left open,one bank and a small sub post office.It is an unused part of town with cars passing through,but never stopping.
